description:
Montreal, Sept. 23, 2014 - Pyston is an open-source Python implementation using JIT techniques developed by Dropbox. Simon Génier

presents a brief overview of the existing Python implementations and explains where Pyston fits in there.

Useful links:
* Pyston: http://sflx.ca/pyston
* Simon: https://twitter.com/smngnr
* MP48: http://sflx.ca/mp48e
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://sflx.ca/jobs
title: Pyston, a new JIT-based Python implementation #MP48
